leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 药物发现-ADMET/性质预测与分子优化生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 标准化→预测→优化→UQ/解释→评测
leaf_cluster.tool_form: QSAR/生成工具 + 评测基准

queries: [WEB] open source drug discovery platform github

tools.name: DrugEx
tools.one_line_profile: De novo drug design method using RNNs and Transformers for multi-objective optimization
tools.detailed_description: DrugEx is a de novo drug design method that integrates an exploration strategy into a Recurrent Neural Network (RNN) or Transformer framework. It uses reinforcement learning to optimize molecules for multiple objectives, including bioactivity and physicochemical properties.

tools.name: TorchDrug
tools.one_line_profile: A powerful and flexible machine learning platform for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: TorchDrug is a machine learning platform designed for drug discovery, covering tasks from molecular property prediction to de novo molecule design and retrosynthesis. It provides graph-based representations and state-of-the-art deep learning models.

tools.name: GT4SD Molecular Design
tools.one_line_profile: Generative AI pipeline for target-based molecular design
tools.detailed_description: Part of the Generative Toolkit for Scientific Discovery (GT4SD), this repository focuses on pipelines for generating molecules tailored to specific targets, leveraging various generative models.

tools.name: ACSConv
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to convert pretrained 2D CNN models to 3D for medical imaging
tools.detailed_description: ACSConv allows for the conversion of standard 2D convolutional neural networks into 3D counterparts, enabling the use of pretrained 2D weights for 3D medical image analysis tasks.

tools.name: InformaticsMatters Virtual Screening
tools.one_line_profile: Virtual screening tools and workflows for the Squonk computational platform
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and Nextflow workflows for virtual screening, including docking and ligand preparation, designed to run on the Squonk2 platform.

tools.name: REINVENT (Legacy)
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular de novo design using RNNs and Reinforcement Learning
tools.detailed_description: The original implementation of REINVENT, a tool for de novo molecular design using recurrent neural networks and reinforcement learning to generate molecules with desired properties.

tools.name: DockStream
tools.one_line_profile: A docking wrapper to enhance de novo molecular design pipelines
tools.detailed_description: DockStream provides a unified interface to various molecular docking software, facilitating their integration into generative molecular design workflows (like REINVENT) for scoring and optimization.

tools.name: REINVENT4
tools.one_line_profile: Modern AI molecular design tool for de novo design and optimization
tools.detailed_description: The latest version of REINVENT, offering a comprehensive platform for de novo design, scaffold hopping, R-group replacement, linker design, and molecule optimization using generative AI.

tools.name: AiZynthFinder
tools.one_line_profile: A tool for retrosynthetic planning using deep learning
tools.detailed_description: AiZynthFinder is a tool for retrosynthetic planning that uses Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) combined with neural networks to predict reaction templates and solve synthesis routes.

tools.name: SmartCADD
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source virtual screening platform combining DL, CADD, and QM
tools.detailed_description: SmartCADD is a virtual screening platform that integrates deep learning, traditional computer-aided drug design (CADD), and quantum mechanics methodologies into a unified Python framework for drug discovery.

tools.name: ACPC
tools.one_line_profile: Chemoinformatics tool for ligand-based virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: ACPC (Auto-Correlation of Partial Charges) is a tool for ligand-based virtual screening that utilizes physicochemical property fields to compare molecules.

tools.name: VirtualFlow for Ligand Preparation (VFLP)
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for large-scale ligand preparation
tools.detailed_description: VFLP is a module of the VirtualFlow platform dedicated to the preparation of ligand libraries for virtual screening, handling tasks like format conversion and protonation.

tools.name: VirtualFlow Utility (VFU)
tools.one_line_profile: Streamlined version of VirtualFlow combining screening and preparation
tools.detailed_description: VFU combines the functionalities of VirtualFlow for Virtual Screening (VFVS) and Ligand Preparation (VFLP) into a more streamlined utility for managing drug discovery workflows.

tools.name: VirtualFlow for Virtual Screening (VFVS)
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for ultra-large-scale virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: VFVS is a workflow platform designed for ultra-large-scale virtual screening on computer clusters, supporting various docking programs and managing massive ligand libraries.

tools.name: AIAgents4Pharma
tools.one_line_profile: AI Agents framework for pharmaceutical R&D automation
tools.detailed_description: A framework for building and deploying AI agents to automate various tasks in drug discovery and development, facilitating interaction with data and tools.

tools.name: DrugEx (XuhanLiu)
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning toolkit for multi-objective drug design
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit for de novo drug design using deep learning, featuring Pareto-based multi-objective optimization to balance polypharmacology and other properties.

tools.name: Admetica
tools.one_line_profile: ADMET property evaluation repository for Datagrok platform
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing scripts and models for evaluating ADMET (Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, Excretion, and Toxicity) properties within the Datagrok platform environment.

tools.name: DeepChem
tools.one_line_profile: Democratizing Deep-Learning for Drug Discovery, Quantum Chemistry, Materials Science and Biology
tools.detailed_description: A high-quality open-source toolchain that democratizes the use of deep learning in drug discovery, materials science, quantum chemistry, and biology.

tools.name: AutoGrow4
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-automated computer-aided drug discovery using genetic algorithms
tools.detailed_description: An open-source program for semi-automated computer-aided drug discovery that uses a genetic algorithm to evolve predicted ligands on demand, generating novel drug-like molecules and optimizing preexisting ligands.

tools.name: OpenVS
tools.one_line_profile: AI accelerated virtual screening platform for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A platform combining artificial intelligence with traditional virtual screening methods to accelerate the drug discovery process, providing scripts and codes for high-throughput screening tasks.

tools.name: torch-molecule
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for molecular discovery with sklearn-style interface
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package designed for molecular discovery, offering an sklearn-style interface for property prediction, inverse design, and representation learning of molecules.

tools.name: ODDT
tools.one_line_profile: Open Drug Discovery Toolkit for cheminformatics and molecular modeling
tools.detailed_description: Open Drug Discovery Toolkit (ODDT) is a modular and comprehensive library for computer-aided drug discovery, providing tools for molecular manipulation, interaction scoring, and virtual screening.

tools.name: AlzyFinder
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based platform for ligand-based virtual screening and network pharmacology
tools.detailed_description: A web-based platform designed for ligand-based virtual screening and network pharmacology analysis, facilitating the identification of potential drug candidates.

tools.name: ADMET-AI
tools.one_line_profile: Training and prediction scripts for Chemprop models on ADMET datasets
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit for training and deploying Chemprop-based models for ADMET property prediction, including a web interface for easy interaction.

tools.name: DataWarrior
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive data analysis and visualization with chemical intelligence
tools.detailed_description: An open-source program for interactive data analysis and visualization that understands chemical structures, widely used for exploring structure-activity relationships (SAR) in drug discovery.

tools.name: REINVENT-GDB13
tools.one_line_profile: RNN implementation for generating molecules from GDB-13
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of a Recurrent Neural Network (RNN) trained on GDB-13 SMILES strings to generate novel molecular structures, part of the REINVENT family of models.

tools.name: REINVENT-Randomized
tools.one_line_profile: RNN using randomized SMILES for molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: A variant of the REINVENT model that utilizes randomized SMILES strings during training to improve the diversity and quality of generated molecules.

tools.name: REINVENT-Scaffold-Decorator
tools.one_line_profile: SMILES-based encoder-decoder for molecular scaffold decoration
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model using an encoder-decoder architecture to decorate molecular scaffolds with functional groups, aiding in lead optimization.
